class_notes: Instructor permission required to enroll.  Synchronous class attendance required. Timed, synchronous assessments. Same as PSYC 304.
course_description: A course focused on the relationships between hormones, brain function and behavior, as well as the techniques used to investigate them.
prerequisites: PSYC_OX 110 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
